website_summaries.verdict: Liquid and stick concealer in one is great for if you want the option of two formulas.
pros: Blends well without being too thick
Doesn't accentuate fine lines or clog pores
Covers dark circles very effectively as well as other dark spots on your face or chest
cons: May be hard to match to your skin tone, as there are not as many tone choices as others

customer_reviews.title: No Good.
customer_reviews.text: I tried it and it barely moved across my skin, it was so dried out. I think this is old product. The expiration date was not a real date (2021-37-17?) so I returned it, Did the same with the mascara, from the same seller, fake expiration date label that was torn. Both boxes were covered in some kind of sticky substance that I am afraid to find out what it is. I am annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I was not pleased at all with this product! The stick concealer goes on like pancake makeup, and the illuminator does not work. It did not do anything but make the dark circles and bags under my eyes look worse! The concealer makes every line show up worse because of the thickness of it, no matter how much you blend it. This product is a serious waste of good money! I threw it away after one use. Just goes to show how good they are at using lighting effects in their little commercials and examples! Will never purchase any of these products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a shade to light but the product is wonderful. It's moisturizing, light & the coverage is perfect. The highlighter is nice but you get very little. That's the only drawback for me. If you figure you're getting 2 products in one - the cost is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Young

customer_reviews.title: I love this! The color is exact and it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The color is exact and it's a bit thick, so you don't need a lot. Dries with a matte finish, and stays on throughout the day. Easy to blend and a good amount for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I’m a bit self conscious about my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this sparingly and instead of foundation for everyday use. Works great! I’m a bit self conscious about my skin and this gives me the boost I need to feel more comfortable. Plus it’s easy to blend! I may try on more in the evening I’m 47 years young with fair complexion
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne J. Dewees

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very upset over the packaging. This is a great product, but the stick concealer was stuck to the cap, making this product unusable.
customer_reviews.author: acoulum

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer I have ever used. From years of sun exposure, i have some sun spots.....some rather large. I have tried drug store concealers, expensive department store cosmetic concealers, as well as Dermablend. After literally spending hundreds of dollars on concealers that didn’t work at all, I decided to try this. The first day I used it (and I apply an inexpensive primer first), I went to work and my co-workers were telling me my face was glowing and looked amazing! They asked me want I was doing differently. I came home and placed another order. It’s so easy to apply and looks great!!!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over-hyped make up with creases
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but I found it to be a little thick and not as smooth to spread. The company says it doesn't crack in the crease areas such as the eye area when you smile, but it does create crack lines. I'm ok with the product.. just not loving it like all the reviews. Over-hyped.
customer_reviews.author: Plumbum09

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Light coverage, smooths on easily. It does not stay matte as long as it could.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Davies

customer_reviews.title: love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! Its light, sheer qnd holds up in hot weather. I am 55 years old ans swear by this makeup and the concealer stick with application is perfect for my dark eyes. 100!!
customer_reviews.author: TexMurph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Really covers , nice color, no yellow. Looks very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Salkins

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had some moisture/hydration
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this. Feels dry and seems to accentuate wrinkles under the eyes rather than coat and cover them.
customer_reviews.author: Cay

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It is a concealer that covers well at first than settles in the wrinkles after a while. Like most others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dark circles
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer for under eye circles!!! Completely hides them with the crayon end, and the liquid end gives a natural glow while covering the red and purple colors of my acne spots pretty darn well.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Odor to my concealer
customer_reviews.text: This particular batch of this concealer has an odor, I’ve ordered from wander beauty before and my concealer has never had an odor. This concerns me if it might be expired?
customer_reviews.author: Jim J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Two-In-One Product
customer_reviews.text: Wander Beauty's Dualist concealer does a fine job of covering and is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R.Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: The best coverage I have ever tried! It truly covers age spots, blemishes and dark circles! Very light weight, can’t even tell it is on! Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love the coverage, not greasy nor slides off. Love an extra for my purse. Ordered several times and has come well packaged and in fresh condition.
customer_reviews.author: skey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Of the five or six concealers I purchased, this was the best. i will probably re-buy it.
customer_reviews.author: onlythegr8z

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really love that it has two types and it works really well. The shade matches really well, is easy to blend and the illuminator has the perfect effect.
customer_reviews.author: Sungskee

customer_reviews.title: Inhances lines
customer_reviews.text: Not for women over 50 with any type of under eye line. Drying and makes lines worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: This product works as expected and does not build up in wrinkles. you will have to reapply after 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful concealer very creamy but stays where you put it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill V.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing concealer. I've tried many brands and this is by far the best concealer and is not harsh on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: MNmom1980

customer_reviews.title: You have to try it to believe it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this concealer! However I don’t use it as a concealer I use it in place of a heavy cakey foundation. Beautiful coverage and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer for 40 something skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love the option of the stick or liquid. Both go on smooth and blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Dianita

customer_reviews.title: The color is just what it says it is. I ordered light and it is light.
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of it. It goes on smooth and creamy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathry Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Blends well
customer_reviews.text: One of the best concealers I have ever used. Blends very well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Worth your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly and covers very well. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam R McGahee

customer_reviews.title: Dualist is a perfect pair.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Covers beautifully and blends in well. The highlighter is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. It really works. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have fair, sensitive skin and was skeptical about trying this product but to my surprise it really does brighten up my face and hide flaws. It's creamy, the perfect color, blends easily and so far has not negatively affected my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers great, but caused serious acne!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing the first could of days- coverage is medium, great for dark spots and color correction, glides on smooth and easy to blend. However, after 3 days of use, it broke my face out so bad! It looked like I had poison ivy all over my face. I stopped using it immediately. I haven't had to buy acne medicated products in years but I had to purchase a cleanser, acne moisturizer, AND acne concealer (bc it was seriously scary and embarrassing) to combat what this did to my face. It's been about a week now and is much better, but my goodness... I don't have sensitive skin, I've never had issues with makeup before, for reference.
customer_reviews.author: michelle k.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a product that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had dark circles under my eyes, and have tried numerous products to make them disappear. This is the first time I’ve found a product that works for me. It isn’t cakey, is easily blended, and doesn’t make my wrinkles stand out. I am thoroughly satisfied and would recommend you try it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Macaluso

customer_reviews.title: Smooth coverage and sooo convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this concealer duo! I mostly use the stick, but the liquid is good too, just tends to sink into my wrinkles. It blends well into my fair skin, and find I don’t need foundation. I do moisturize first as I am in a very dry and cold climate.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer I've found
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer, especially the stick/liquid combo. I'm 45 and I have fair skin and large dark patches on my face. This product has worked better than anything else I've tried. I can cover my spots completely, and it also works well on dark circles. It doesn't look cakey, even under eyes. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars from me is that I do have to reapply in places if I want the coverage to last all day. Still worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST CONCEALER EVER - A LIGHT BRINGER!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't gather in your wrinkles and it really does hide darkness! I can't say enough good things about this amazingly effective product. My only mild disappointment is that half of it is liquid, which does not produce nearly as much coverage as the creamy lipsticky product on the other end.
customer_reviews.author: Siddha108

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, goes on smoothly and lasts for hours. Nice to have both the stick and liquid together in case. My only complaint is that the liquid concealer may run out quickly if used for more than just touch ups
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Creases terribly
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst concealer I’ve ever tried. Creases terribly (both sides) and feels heavy on your face. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spillers

customer_reviews.title: Works great, my wife like them.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this for a long time. She gives it a Thumbs up! Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but only lite coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but it didn’t stay or have the coverage that it stated.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Walters

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The best coverage I’ve found for dark circles. Brand new stick broke within seconds of use. Never had an issue with the other one I had but his one broke in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: KAC

customer_reviews.title: Nice 2-in-1
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a little high for amount of product you get.
customer_reviews.author: BrahmaMom

customer_reviews.title: careful twisting
customer_reviews.text: You have to be careful when twisting the caps so you don't accidentally mush the cover stick.
customer_reviews.author: saketome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than I had expected so has become a regular part of my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

product_meta.title: Wander Beauty Dualist Matte & Illuminating Concealer - Light - Full coverage matte stick on one end and a lightweight illuminating liquid on the other, Evens dark spots and blemishes, Neutralizes darkness under eyes, Corrects redness and uneven skin tone, Blurs the appearance of pores, fine lines and texture, Illuminates and brightens under eyes.
feature_bullets: DUAL ENDED CONCEALER equipped with a TUG FREE, FULL COVERAGE MATTE STICK on one end and a LIGHTWEIGHT ILLUMINATING LIQUID on the other

11-IN-1 MULTITASKING CONCEALER - Evens dark spots and blemishes, Neutralizes darkness under eyes Corrects redness and uneven skin tone, Blurs the appearance of pores, fine lines and texture Illuminates and brightens under eyes, Highlights to enhance key features Contours to sculpt features, Primes lids for eyeshadow Soothes skin with aloe vera, Protects against free radicals with vitamin E Improves skin elasticity with collagen.

APPLY MATTE STICK over imperfections, redness, or discoloration. Blend with fingers as needed. USE ILLUMINATING LIQUID to swipe under eyes in a triangle shape to brighten and diffuse fine lines. Apply to cheek bones for an added lift. Blend into center of forehead to highlight
AWARD WINNING: O, The Oprah Magazine Fall Beauty O-wards winner. 2017 Star Beauty Award winner.
CLEAN BEAUTY - Cruelty free. Gluten free. Always free of parabens, phthalates, synthetic fragrance, and mineral oil.
